rides_and_gardens.name: The Dragon's Flight
rides_and_gardens.description: This roller coaster mimics the flight of a dragon, swooping guests through ancient, mist-covered mountains and deep, lush valleys.

rides_and_gardens.name: Enchanted Forest Walk
rides_and_gardens.description: This garden offers a peaceful walk through a beautifully designed forest setting that feels magical.

rides_and_gardens.name: Tidal Wave Tower
rides_and_gardens.description: A thrilling water ride that lifts guests to a great height before plunging them down into a massive splash pool.

rides_and_gardens.name: Blossom Gardens
rides_and_gardens.description: A garden dedicated to showcasing a variety of flowering plants and trees from around the world.

rides_and_gardens.name: Canyon Racers
rides_and_gardens.description: Two parallel tracks race each other through a canyon-themed area.
